row.process:
! run book function to get environment variable ! ! @echo off echo Checking IP addresses.. "%SYSTEMROOT%\system32\ipconfig.exe" /all |findstr /C:"IPv4 Address" /C:"IP Address"
set returncode=%errorlevel% if %returncode% EQU 0 ( echo Successfully get IP addresses ) else ( echo Error occurred whilst getting IP adddress ) exit /b %returncode% :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS

row.post_process: :SET &IPS# = "" :SET &IP_REPORT# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*. . . :*","COL=DELIMITER","DELIMITER=*: *") :PROCESS &IP_REPORT# : SET &RET_VAL# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&IP_REPORT#,2) : IF &RET_VAL# = " " : SET &RET_VAL#="" : ENDIF : IF &RET_VAL# <> "" : SET &RET_VAL# = STR_SUB(&RET_VAL#,"(Preferred)") : PRINT &RET_VAL# : IF &IPS# = "" : SET &IPS# = "&RET_VAL#" : ELSE : SET &IPS# = "&IPS#,&RET_VAL#" : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :PSET &UC4RB_HOST_IPS# = &IPS# :CLOSE_PROCESS &IP_REPORT#
